Malachi.1: 'I have loved you,' says the LORD. 'Where is my honour? You offer blind and lame sacrifices. My name will be great among the nations.'
Malachi.2: 'Now, O priests, I will curse you. You have corrupted the covenant of Levi.' Judah has profaned the sanctuary. The LORD hates divorce.
Malachi.3: 'My messenger will prepare the way. I will come to judge. You have robbed me of tithes. The LORD will remember those who serve him.'
Malachi.4: 'The day is coming like a furnace. The sun of righteousness will rise. The wicked will be ashes. I will send you Elijah the prophet.'
